name: .RNA
summary: Learn about .RNA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an RNA file with GSL Biotech SnapGene (multiplatform). To open an RNA file with SnapGene, select File â†’ Open Files.... Since GSL Biotech introduced the RNA format when it released SnapGene 5.3, SnapGene versions earlier than 5.3 open RNA files as DNA files.
You can also open an RNA file with SnapGene Viewer (multiplatform). However, it does not provide the same extensive capabilities that SnapGene offers.
GSL Biotech SnapGene can convert RNA files to various file types, including the following formats:
